DescribeBillDetail.document: This API is used to query bill details.
DescribeBillDetail.name: Queries bill details

DescribeBillResourceSummary.document: This API is used to query bill resources summary.
DescribeBillResourceSummary.name: Queries bill resource summary

DescribeBillSummaryByPayMode.document: Gets the bill summarized according to billing mode
DescribeBillSummaryByPayMode.name: Gets the bill summarized according to billing mode

DescribeBillSummaryByProduct.document: Gets the bill summarized according to product
DescribeBillSummaryByProduct.name: Gets the bill summarized according to product

DescribeBillSummaryByProject.document: Gets the bill summarized according to project
DescribeBillSummaryByProject.name: Gets the bill summarized according to project

DescribeBillSummaryByRegion.document: Gets the bill summarized according to region
DescribeBillSummaryByRegion.name: Gets the bill summarized according to region

DescribeBillSummaryByTag.document: This API is used to get the cost distribution over different tags.
DescribeBillSummaryByTag.name: Gets cost distribution over different tags

ActionSummaryOverviewItem.document: Detailed summary of costs by transaction type

members.document: Cost ratio, to two decimal points
members.name: RealTotalCostRatio

members.document: The original cost in USD. This parameter has become valid since v3.0 bills took effect in May 2021, and before that `-` was returned for this parameter. If a customer uses a contract price different from the published price, `-` will also be returned for this parameter.
members.name: TotalCost

members.document: Product name: major categories of Tencent Cloud services, e.g. CVM and TencentDB for MySQL
members.name: BusinessCodeName

members.document: Sub-product name: sub-categories of Tencent Cloud services, such as CVM-Standard S1
members.name: ProductCodeName

members.document: Region: region of a resource, e.g. South China (Guangzhou)
members.name: RegionName

members.document: Availability zone: availability zone of a resource, e.g. Guangzhou Zone 3
members.name: ZoneName

members.document:
Tag information
Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: Tags

members.document:
Product code
Note: this field may return `null`, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: BusinessCode

members.document:
Subproduct code
Note: this field may return `null`, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: ProductCode

members.document: Project ID: ID of the project to which the resource belongs
members.name: ProjectId

BillDetailComponent.document: Information about components charged in the bill

members.document: Component type: type of a resource component, e.g. memory, disk, etc.
members.name: ComponentCodeName

members.document: Component name: name of a resource component, e.g. TencentDB for MySQL-memory
members.name: ItemCodeName

members.document: Component published price: original price of a resource component with the original granularity
members.name: SinglePrice

members.document:
Component type code
Note: this field may return `null`, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: ItemCode

members.document:
Component code
Note: this field may return `null`, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: ComponentCode

BillResourceSummary.document: Information about resources charged in the bill

members.document: Product name: major categories of Tencent Cloud services, e.g. CVM and TencentDB for MySQL
members.name: BusinessCodeName

members.document: Sub-product name: sub-categories of Tencent Cloud services, such as CVM-Standard S1; if no subproduct name is obtained, '-' is returned.
members.example: 实时音视频-音视频通话
members.name: ProductCodeName

members.example: 音视频通话-自定义套餐包: 1000分钟;
members.name: ConfigDesc

members.document:
Discount
If different discounts or contract prices are applied, `-` will be returned for this parameter.
members.name: Discount

members.document: Total cost after discount, in USD
members.name: RealTotalCost

members.document: Amount paid in voucher, in USD
members.name: VoucherPayAmount

members.document: Amount paid in cash, in USD
members.name: CashPayAmount

members.document: Amount paid in trial credit, in USD
members.name: IncentivePayAmount

members.document:
Tag information
Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: Tags

members.document: Resource owner UIN; '-' is returned if no value is obtained
members.name: OwnerUin

members.document: Operator UIN; '-' is returned if no value is obtained
members.name: OperateUin

members.document:
Product code
Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid value was found.
members.name: BusinessCode

members.document: Product name: major categories of Tencent Cloud services, e.g. CVM and TencentDB for MySQL
members.name: BusinessCodeName

members.document: Cost ratio, to two decimal points
members.name: RealTotalCostRatio

members.document: The original cost in USD. This parameter has become valid since v3.0 bills took effect in May 2021, and before that `-` was returned for this parameter. If a customer uses a contract price different from the published price, `-` will also be returned for this parameter.
members.name: TotalCost

members.document: The original cost in USD. This parameter has become valid since v3.0 bills took effect in May 2021, and before that `-` was returned for this parameter. If a customer uses a contract price different from the published price, `-` will also be returned for this parameter.
members.name: TotalCost

members.document: The period type. byUsedTime: By usage period; byPayTime: By payment period. Must be the same as the period of the current monthly bill of the Billing Center. You can check your bill statistics period type at the top of the [Bill Overview](https://console.cloud.tencent.com/expense/bill/overview) page.
members.name: PeriodType

members.document: Month; format: yyyy-mm. You only have to enter either Month or BeginTime and EndTime. When you enter values for BeginTime and EndTime, Month becomes invalid. This value must be no earlier than the month when Bill 2.0 is activated; last 24 months data are available.
members.name: Month

members.document: The start time of the period; format: Y-m-d H:i:s. You only have to enter either Month or BeginTime and EndTime. When you enter values for BeginTime and EndTime, Month becomes invalid. BeginTime and EndTime must be inputted as a pair. This value must be no earlier than the month when Bill 2.0 is activated; last 24 months data are available.
members.name: BeginTime

members.document: The end time of the period; format: Y-m-d H:i:s. You only have to enter either Month or BeginTime and EndTime. When you enter values for BeginTime and EndTime, Month becomes invalid. BeginTime and EndTime must be inputted as a pair. This value must be no earlier than the month when Bill 2.0 is activated; last 24 months data are available.
members.name: EndTime

members.document:
Indicates whether or not the total number of records of accessing the list is required, used for frontend pages.
1 = yes, 0 = no
members.name: NeedRecordNum

members.document: Queries information on a specified product
members.name: ProductCode

members.document: Queries information on a specified resource
members.name: ResourceId

members.document:
Action type to query. Valid values:
Purchase
Renewal
Modify
Refund
Deduction
Hourly settlement
Daily settlement
Monthly settlement
Offline project deduction
Offline deduction
adjust-CR
adjust-DR
One-off RI Fee
Spot
Hourly RI fee
New monthly subscription
Monthly subscription renewal
Monthly subscription specification adjustment
Monthly subscription specification adjustment
Monthly subscription refund
members.name: ActionType

members.document: Project ID: ID of the project to which the resource belongs
members.name: ProjectId

members.document: Business code Note: To query business codes used in the current month, call DescribeBillSummaryByProduct.
members.name: BusinessCode

members.document:
Total number of records
Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid value was found.
members.name: Total

members.document: The unique request ID, which is returned for each request. RequestId is required for locating a problem.
members.name: RequestId

members.document: Month; format: yyyy-mm. This value cannot be earlier than the month when Bill 2.0 is enabled. Last 24 months data are available.
members.name: Month

members.document: The period type. byUsedTime: By usage period; byPayTime: by payment period. Must be the same as the period of the current monthly bill of the Billing Center. You can check your bill statistics period type at the top of the [Bill Overview](https://console.cloud.tencent.com/expense/bill/overview) page.
members.name: PeriodType

members.document:
Indicates whether or not the total number of records of accessing the list is required, used for frontend pages.
1 = yes, 0 = no
members.name: NeedRecordNum

members.document:
Action type to query. Valid values:
Purchase

Modify

members.name: ActionType

members.document: ID of the instance to be queried
members.name: ResourceId

members.document: Business code Note: To query business codes used in the current month, call DescribeBillSummaryByProduct.
members.name: BusinessCode

members.document:
Total number of resource summary lists
Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid value was found.
members.name: Total

members.document: The unique request ID, which is returned for each request. RequestId is required for locating a problem.
members.name: RequestId

members.document: The value must be of the same month as `EndTime`. Query period must start and end on the same month and the query result returned will be of the entire month. For example, if both `BeginTime` and `EndTime` are `2018-09`, the data returned will be for the entire month of September 2018.
members.name: BeginTime

members.document: The value must be of the same month as `BeginTime`. Query period must start and end on the same month and the query result returned will be of the entire month. For example, if both `BeginTime` and `EndTime` are `2018-09`, the data returned will be for the entire month of September 2018.
members.name: EndTime

members.document: Indicates whether or not the data is ready. 0 = not ready, 1 = ready.
members.name: Ready

Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid value was found.

For example, if both `BeginTime` and `EndTime` are `2018-09`, the data returned will be for the entire month of September 2018.
members.name: EndTime

members.document:
A bill type, which corresponds to a subtotal type of L0 bills.
This parameter has become valid since v3.0 bills took effect in May 2021.
Valid values:
`consume`: consumption
`refund`: refund
`adjustment`: bill adjustment
members.name: PayType

members.document: Indicates whether or not the data is ready. 0 = not ready, 1 = ready.
